description.p: Leonara are the dominant race of the deserts, populating the arid realm in large but scattered numbers. They are not necessarily a hostile race but they are protective of their own and powerful enough as a united nation to resist invasion. They believe in strength, loyalty, and most of all, tradition.

LION MEN: The leonara are a beast-race, and look very much like bipedal lions. Like lions, they have feline features, the males have large manes and paws. Their feet are jointed like a lion's and some are born with a tail, while others without. Their more human characteristics are their opposable thumbs, upright stature, and the basic shape of their chest and waist.
Ability Score Increase. Your Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution scores all increase by 1.
Age. Leonara reach adulthood by 15, and could live up to 150.
Size. Leonara generally grow 5 to 8 ft tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 ft. You may increase your speed to 40 ft when you drop on all fours.
Languages. You can communicate in both Common and Feline.
Claws. Leonaras bear razor sharp claws they use for fighting. Your unarmed attacks deal 1d4 slashing damage.
Keen Smell. You have advantage on Perception checks relying on scent.
Lion's Strength You have advantage on Athletics checks when grappling.
RACIAL WEAPON. You are proficient with Armguards.
Both Leonara and Leonim in Escara have developed their own feline language that is unique to their culture.
